application_description.message: This application connects your EV3 to Open Roberta Lab via USB cable.

infotext_plugin.message: Connect the EV3 to your computer via the USB cable. It will be detected automatically after a few seconds.

infotext_connect.message: Click on »connect« to connect your robot to Open Roberta Lab.

infotext_tokencopy.message: Type in the token under robots>connect in the Open Roberta Lab, by using »copy« and »paste«.

infotext_runprogram.message: Now, you can run your programs on the EV3. Do not forget to plug in the cable again, after your program execution has finished.

dialog_brickerror.message: The connection to your robot has been interrupted.

dialog_interneterror.message: Open Roberta Lab is unreachable. Please check your internet connection.

dialog_about.message: This program is part of the Open Roberta Lab, an open-source programming platform developed by Fraunhofer IAIS within the initiative »Roberta Learning with Robots« version 1.3.0

dialog_timeout_msg.message: The token is expired. Try again.

dialog_confirm_disconnect.message: If you close the program, your robot is no longer connected to Open Roberta Lab.
